amendatorysection.catchline: Class V school district; property subject to school tax; management of affairs of district.
amendatorysection.para: All property within the corporate limits of cities of the metropolitan class, except such property as now is or may hereafter be exempt by law, shall be subject to taxation for all school purposes. The affairs of the school district created by Chapter 79 shall be conducted exclusively by the board of education except as otherwise provided by Chapter 79.

annotation.para: Annexation of territory adjacent to metropolitan city did not ipso facto make territory annexed a part of the school district of city. Ratigan v. Davis, 175 Neb. 416, 122 N.W.2d 12 (1963).
